data.comment: The match is underway. Rubin Kazan have kicked-off.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Jordan Larsson scores to make it 0-1 at Kazan Arena.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 10, Spartak Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 17, Oleg Shatov (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 19, Denis Makarov of Rubin Kazan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 21, Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
Mikhail Merkulov scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 0-2 at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 24, Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Rubin Kazan's Khvicha Kvaratskhelia has been booked in Kazan.
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Kazan.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Oliver Abildgaard is booked for the home team.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 30, Pavel Maslov (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kirill Levnikov awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Spartak Moscow's Zelimkhan Bakaev gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow surge into the attack at Kazan Arena but Ezequiel Ponceâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 36, Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
The match at Kazan Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Georgi Dzhikiya, who is down injured.
Georgi Dzhikiya returns to the field for Spartak Moscow after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 38, Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan just outside Spartak Moscow's area.
In the minute 40, Rubin Kazan's Oleg Shatov breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
In Kazan, Zelimkhan Bakaev of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 41, Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Alex Kral fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 44, Rubin Kazan push upfield and Denis Makarov gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Spartak Moscow defence.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Spartak Moscow kick-off.
Kirill Levnikov awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
At Kazan Arena, Mikhail Merkulov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In Kazan Rubin Kazan attack through Djordje Despotovic. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 52, Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Jordan Larsson for Spartak Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In the minute 53, Rubin Kazan make their first substitution with Filip Uremovic replacing Mikhail Merkulov.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 56, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 59, Rubin Kazan's Djordje Despotovic gets in a shot on goal at Kazan Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 61, Aleksandr Maksimenko (Spartak Moscow) has received a yellow card from Kirill Levnikov.
Red card in Kazan! Pavel Maslov has been shown a second yellow card by Kirill Levnikov.
Domenico Tedesco is making the team's first substitution at Kazan Arena with Ilya Gaponov replacing Jordan Larsson.
In the minute 63, Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kirill Levnikov awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 67, Rubin Kazan pushes forward through Darko Jevtic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Leonid Slutskiy (Rubin Kazan) is making a second substitution, with Ivan Ignatyev replacing Aleksandr Zuev.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 72, Rubin Kazan advance rapidly upfield but Kirill Levnikov blows for offside.
Oleg Shatov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 73, Rubin Kazan drives forward and Darko Jevtic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Zelimkhan Bakaev with Oston Urunov.
Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
In the minute 77, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Andrey Eshchenko is replacing Nail Umyarov for the away team.
The home team have replaced Carl Starfelt with Soltmurad Bakaev. This is the third substitution made today by Leonid Slutskiy.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 81, Oston Urunov (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 83, Rubin Kazan push forward at Kazan Arena and Djordje Despotovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spartak Moscow defence.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Denis Makarov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kazan.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Ilya Gaponov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 88, Aleksandr Sobolev is on a sub for Ezequiel Ponce for Spartak Moscow.
Rubin Kazan's Djordje Despotovic is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan are pushing forward but Oliver Abildgaard's finish is wide of the goal.
Kirill Levnikov awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Kazan Arena.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Filip Uremovic (Rubin Kazan) has received a first yellow card.
Denis Makarov (Rubin Kazan) has received a first yellow card.
Darko Jevtic is booked for the home team.
